field11.field_front_text_php: 2. Age (in months) when parents first noticed that something was amiss
field11.note_php:
Code age in months, or choose one of the below codes. Try to code an actual age rather than 996, etc. Note: If parents express age in weeks, code ta nearest month. if an age range is given (e.g., 3-4 months), take the midpoint and round up to nearest month. As far as possible, try to code an actual age rather than 996, etc.
991= parents not concerned, although child was referred by professional
992= parents have been worried since birth (e.g., if baby premature or very ill at birth)
996= can't recall, but before 12 months
997= can't recall, but 12 months or later
998= N/A
999= N/K or not asked
